name: I quit
description:
You only need reach the goal.

Use your reflexes, determination and muscle memory in this skill game that will challenge your patience to reach the end.

-----------------------------------------------

It is strongly recommended to play with a gamepad of some kind. The keyboard will be handicapped in future releases. 

-----------------------------------------------

Third alpha of this conceptual project. (far from being finished though)

- 26 levels.
- 3 basic visual styles.
- 20 different obstacles.

Main ideas to achieve:

- Difficulty must rise. Also for the level length.
- Secrets.
- More music related to the different styles.
- Many more obstacles and level variety.
- Sound effects.

I have some very interesting ideas I wan't to try in future updates, but if you have also please leave a comment. Is much appreciated.

Please consider support the project if you ejoyed it.

-----------------------------------------------

Music:

Sunshower by LATASHA
